segment.source: How to Determine Which Type of Application to Sequence (App-V 4.6 SP1)
segment.target: How to Determine Which Type of Application to Sequence (App-V 4.6 SP1)

segment.source: How to Determine Which Type of Application to Sequence (App-V 4.6 SP1)
segment.target: How to Determine Which Type of Application to Sequence (App-V 4.6 SP1)

segment.source: How to Determine Which Type of Application to Sequence (App-V 4.6 SP1)
segment.target: How to Determine Which Type of Application to Sequence (App-V 4.6 SP1)

segment.source: You can sequence three basic types of applications by using Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) Sequencer.
segment.target: You can sequence three basic types of applications by using Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) Sequencer.

segment.source: To determine which type of application to sequence
segment.target: To determine which type of application to sequence

segment.source: Use the following table to determine which type of application you should sequence and to obtain more information about how to sequence the application.
segment.target: Use the following table to determine which type of application you should sequence and to obtain more information about how to sequence the application.

segment.source: Application Type
segment.target: Application Type

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: More Information
segment.target: More Information

segment.source: Standard
segment.target: Standard

segment.source: Select this option to create a package that contains an application or a suite of applications.
segment.target: Select this option to create a package that contains an application or a suite of applications.

segment.source: You should select this option for most applications that you plan to sequence.
segment.target: You should select this option for most applications that you plan to sequence.

segment.source: How to Sequence a New Standard Application (App-V 4.6 SP1)
segment.target: How to Sequence a New Standard Application (App-V 4.6 SP1)

segment.source: Add-on or Plug-in
segment.target: Add-on or Plug-in

segment.source: Select this option to create a package that extends the functionality of a standard application, for example, a plug-in for Microsoft Excel.
segment.target: Select this option to create a package that extends the functionality of a standard application, for example, a plug-in for Microsoft Excel.

segment.source: Additionally, you can use plug-ins for natively installed applications, or another package that is linked by using Dynamic Suite Composition.
segment.target: Additionally, you can use plug-ins for natively installed applications, or another package that is linked by using Dynamic Suite Composition.

segment.source: For more information about Dynamic Suite Composition, see How To Use Dynamic Suite Composition (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=203804).
segment.target: For more information about Dynamic Suite Composition, see How To Use Dynamic Suite Composition (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=203804).

segment.source: How to Sequence a New Add-on or Plug-in Application (App-V 4.6 SP1)
segment.target: How to Sequence a New Add-on or Plug-in Application (App-V 4.6 SP1)

segment.source: Middleware
segment.target: Middleware

segment.source: Select this option to create a package that is required by a standard application, for example, the Microsoft .NET Framework.
segment.target: Select this option to create a package that is required by a standard application, for example, the Microsoft .NET Framework.

segment.source: Middleware packages are used for linking to other packages by using Dynamic Suite Composition.
segment.target: Middleware packages are used for linking to other packages by using Dynamic Suite Composition.

segment.source: For more information about Dynamic Suite Composition, see How To Use Dynamic Suite Composition (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=203804).
segment.target: For more information about Dynamic Suite Composition, see How To Use Dynamic Suite Composition (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=203804).

segment.source: How to Sequence a New Middleware Application (App-V 4.6 SP1)
segment.target: How to Sequence a New Middleware Application (App-V 4.6 SP1)

segment.target: Related topics
